message: Let's split it 50/50 and start fresh!
You can have 30, I'll take the rest. It's a fair deal!
I'll give you a bigger share, but I need a bit more for myself.
I'll give you a small share, but I'm taking the majority. It's my turn now!
I'll compromise, but I need a bit more than before. Let's meet in the middle.
I'm getting desperate, but I'll still offer you a small share. Take it or leave it!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need a fair share. Don't be greedy!
I'm taking control, you're getting scraps. Accept and save some dignity!
I'm running out of patience, but I'll still give you a decent share. Meet me halfway!
I'm taking what's left, you're getting nothing. It's almost over!
I'm making a last-ditch effort, meet me in the middle and let's end this!
